problem.markdown:
>>Where will you find the ‘enable cohorts’ feature?<<
(!) In Studio > Advanced settings ( ) In Studio > Group settings ( ) Through the Instructor Dashboard > Student Admin (x) Through the Instructor Dashboard > Cohorts
[explanation] Not much to explain here, I suppose. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Where will you find the ‘enable cohorts’ feature?

choicegroup.choice: Through the Instructor Dashboard > Student Admin

div.p: Not much to explain here, I suppose.
